attributes.comment:
This is to register my opposition to USCIS-2006-0044. A 69% (total) fee hike on citizenship
applications is completely unreasonable, and will actually make it much more difficult for many of
the applicants to apply. Last I checked, we want *more* people to apply for and gain citizenship,
not fewer. Encourage them to join in and they will; don't make the wall even higher. Marginalization
is never a good thing, and this proposal will promote that.

Please reconsider your position; there should be other ways to recoup, reduce or reverse increases
in operating costs.

Thank you,

Brian Lewin
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Brian Lewin
